segments.text: I notice the boy is stretching so far to reach those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks like it’s about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at how determined they are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on that plate, she doesn’t see anything else.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring and pouring, and she’s standing right in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll slip and fall before she even realizes what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen looks so ordinary, but it’s full of little disasters waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get their cookies before the stool gives out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside is so calm, it’s like another world.
segments.speaker: PAR
